title: Looking to Buy These T206 (H thru O)
author: Bocabirdman

posts.post_title: Looking to Buy These T206 (H thru O)
posts.post_content:
Hi Folks,

My first posting for middling condition raw T206 commons produced three completed transactions for 5 cards. Below please find my needs for H thru O. PM me please if you have anything on this, or my A thru F post (which is floundering on the second page as I type this) that you want to sell. Thanks in advance to any who may respond.:)

What I need for H thru O is:

203. Charlie Hemphill
